articles.title: Cheetahs will join South African teams in Europe next season, EPCR confirms - The42
articles.description: A total of five South African sides will now be involved across the 2022/23 Champions and Challenge Cups.
articles.content:
EPCR HAVE CONFIRMED that a total of five South African teams will compete across the 2022/23 Heineken Champions and Challenge Cups.
